description:
Erika Konno starts lashing out at her classmates after the school`s sports festival, and opinions are deeply divided on the best way to shut her down.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Happy Ending Doesn`t Mean This Game Is Over
Happy End o Mukaeta Ato mo Jinsei wa Tsuzuku
ハッピーエンドを迎えたあとも人生は続く
